flawed_nl_solution:
Initially, Lizzy had $30; she loaned out $15 so she has $30-$15 = $<<30-15=11>>11 left
Her friend is returning the $15 with 20/100 interest for a total of $15+($15*(20/100)) = $<<15+15*(20/100)=18>>18
Lizzy will now have $11+$18 = $<<11+18=29>>29
#### 29

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
